constraint.description: All change sets has to specify the author attribute.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (set:ChangeSet) WHERE NOT HAS(set.author) RETURN set

constraint.description: All change sets has to specify the id attribute.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (set:ChangeSet) WHERE NOT HAS(set.id) RETURN set

constraint.description: All change sets has to specify a comment.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (set:ChangeSet) WHERE NOT HAS(set.comment) RETURN set
